page.title: 10AN OLD AGE PENSIONERS DAY
page.content: Mrs Hay,an old age pensioner,gets up at half past eight each morning.She usually has a bowl of cereal and a cup of tea for her breakfast. After breakfast,Mrs Hay does the general houswork including making the bed, tiding the the house and washing breakfast dishes. Lunch is at half past twelve and she often has her niece coming from school for dinner.In the afternoon Mrs Hay is either visting other people or knitting.She visits the elderly people in her area reagulary.Tea time is five o'clock.In the eveing she watches televison.Every Wedensday Mrs Hay goes to a pensioners club .She goes to bed about ten o' clock. Her pension of 37 pounds 25 pence, is collected on a Monday from the post office.With relatives visting regulary, Mrs Hay is very happy.
